page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE (SCHOOLBOY)
page.content:
SCHOOL STARTS AT 9am WITH REGISTRATION AND ASSEMBLY,A MEETING WITH THE HEADMASTER IN WHICH WE SING AND PRAY. WE HAVE TWO LESSONS BEFORE PLAYTIME OF 30 MINUTES,THEN ANOTHER THREE LESSONS BEFORE THE LUNCH BREAK. TWICE A WEEK WE HAVE A SPORTS PERIOD LASTING AN HOUR;IN SUMMER WE PLAY CRICKET AND ATHLETICS, AND IN WINTER,RUGBY AND FOOTBALL. RUGBY IS MY FAVORITE SPORT. ON WEDNESDAYS WE HAVE ART IMMEDIATELY AFTER LUNCH. THE USUAL TIME OF DEPARTURE IS 4pm,BUT IF YOU WOULD RATHER STAY UNTIL 6pm,YOU CAN. A CUP OF TEA,A GAME OF CRICKET BEFORE AN HOUR'S PREP(PERHAPS ENGLISH,MATHS, FRENCH,LATIN,GEOGRAPHY,HISTORY, SCRIPTURE OR SCIENCE)LEAD UP TO HOME TIME. DOMINIC MAC
10 years
